page.title: 10NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: COUNTY DAY - WHITSUN. Every year at Whitsun a large fair comes to Hertford It opens for a week on Hartham Common and has many rides and sideshows.The actual County Day is only on one day with a market and lots of stalls.A carnival starts at Hartham in the afternoon,going through the town centre to return to Hartham later. HERTFORD FUN RUN - MAY.The Hertford run takes place once a year.Lots of runners take part for fun to run the ten miles and return to Hertford. SPONSORED WALK - MAY.The walk raises money for Christian Aid.The walkers try to get sponsors to raise as much as possible.They walk a circular route of about 30 miles. PANTOMIME - CHRISTMAS.Every year the Hertford Operatic and Dramatic Society put on a pantomime as well as a number of other shows at Castle Hall.
